__e: Yes, sir, but i'm afraid my steward can't.
My mom's away for the weekend, our butler's off duty... and my dad will be leaving for the office at any minute.
I don't know who you are, but you're certainly not the butler. So don't try and make out you are.
I understand how hard this is for you, but if you could just stay until I find a new butler and housekeeper...
Sarah thought I'd be better off as a butler and that's what I'm trying for.
Would you consider a position as butler and chef to His Majesty the king?
If it's any consolation I know an old butler who's mighty glad to see you.
If you don't mind, I'm talking to my butler whom I haven't seen... since he passed away five years ago.
Would you tell the help here that I can come and go as I please, please?
He's not talking, but near as we can tell he was the old lady's butler.
Many years ago, when my father was butler to the family,
Stick around, and keep waiting hand and foot on a girl I can never have?
